summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of PERKINS LANE WEST from approximately 300 feet southeasterly of the production northeasterly of West Smith Street to approximately 500 feet southeasterly of said produced street; and from approximately 20 feet northwesterly of West McGraw Street to approximately 350 feet southeasterly of West McGraw Street; and a certain other street and easements, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6574, and appropriating additional money from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund in aid thereof as a loan.
